title: Won 2 games out of 13
body:
Where is the 50%/50%?, I am not at plat level and i keep getting people who are plat, I have been very bored of LOL because the games are uneven, I'm not even level 30 yet, Im at a massive disadvantage, I have tier 2 runes because the IP prices are insane.

It does not matter how well i play i still lose, There is 99% of the time a feeder and you can not do anything about it, I got a level 10 and they got a gold 3, How is that even logic? and yes we got owned by that annie, All she did was ult spam.

I'v had lessons from gold,plat players and they have said i'm a good player but you cant carry everyone all the time, Does not matter how many times i counter gank, Does not matter how well i play or how many times i gank, The lanes lose, Its more based on luck of the team, If your team is bad then you have lost and that has happend to me, Most of my games i play to improve but losing most of my games when playing well makes me angry, All the lanes are always losing and pinging for help, Its like a blame game "Jungler sucks" "No gank", I had 17 assist, I tried my best, Adc was bad, I had to carry bottom

replies.body:
Shit happens, luck happens.
Try garen support.
